thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 8 of 122
thread.title: sonia blake

author: sonia blake
title: sonia blake
text: I booked with dialaflight to go to jamaica it was a family of five of us and also another couple with 2 kids..the price was right for my budget fantastic for the christmas and new years..i had a briliant rep who kept in touch with us making sure we was ok with our booking his name is trishan chatburn excellent customer service couldnt of asked for a better rep..he even called us the day before we were due to fly out..will recommend dialaflight defo great bargins great customer service ...well done trishan..will be booking again very soon
